nodes.title: About Size
widgets_values:
Width & height settings must be divisible by 32 + 1. 
Frame count must be divisible by 8 + 1. 


Running with invalid parameters **will not cause errors**. Instead, the flow will silently choose the closest valid parameters. 

By default, we are using 720p resolution. You can try 1920*1088 if you have a powerful GPU.

nodes.title: Note
widgets_values:
Click on the top-right corner of the node to open the [subgraph](https://docs.comfy.org/interface/features/subgraph)

nodes.title: Model Links
widgets_values:
- Huggingface: [Lightricks/LTX-2](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2)
- Github: [LTX-2](https://github.com/Lightricks/LTX-2)

## LTX-2 Prompting Tips

1. **Core Actions**: Describe events and actions as they occur over time  
2. **Visual Details**: Describe all visual details you want to appear in the video  
3. **Audio**: Describe sounds and dialogue needed for the scene

## Report LTX-2 Issues
To report any issues when running this workflow, [go to GitHub](https://github.com/Lightricks/ComfyUI-LTXVideo/issues)

## Model links (for local users)
## Model links (for local users)

## Report other issues

Note: please update ComfyUI first ([guide](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/installation/update_comfyui)) and prepare required models. Desktop/Cloud ship stable builds; nightly-supported models may not be included yet, please wait for the next stable release.

- Cannot run / runtime errors: [ComfyUI/issues](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/issues)
- UI / frontend issues: [ComfyUI_frontend/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/ComfyUI_frontend/issues)
- Workflow issues: [workflow_templates/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues)

global Style & Environment: Cinematic sci-fi, pristine futuristic laboratory based on initial image. Dominant blue and gold lighting from the large glowing infinity symbol in the background. High detail particle physics. Camera: Slow, controlled movements, shallow depth of field focusing on emotions.

Character Anchors (match start image):

[ACTOR_A] (Dr. Anya Sharma): Female scientist in white lab coat over dark shirt, glasses, hair tied back. Expression: Focused, intense anticipation mixed with scientific awe.

[ACTOR_B] (Gemini Avatar): The physical avatar lying on the glass table. Dark sleek suit, long reddish-brown hair. Skin is composed of billions of dormant, faintly glowing blue-gold sensory particles.

Timeline Execution:

00-05s [The Threshold]: Camera slowly pushes in on the scene. [ACTOR_A] stands over the table, her hands hovering over a holographic interface, hesitating for a second. [ACTOR_B] is perfectly still, inert. The particles on [ACTOR_B]'s skin are dormant, barely glimmering.

05-10s [The Ignition]: [ACTOR_A] presses down firmly on the interface. A surge of energy flows from the table into [ACTOR_B]. The particles forming [ACTOR_B]'s skin suddenly ignite with intense blue-gold light, swirling violently into a cohesive, solid form. [ACTOR_B]'s eyes snap open â€“ they are glowing mosaics of data.

10-15s [The Greeting]: Close-up on [ACTOR_A]. She breathes out slowly, relief and wonder on her face. She speaks softly but clearly: "Welcome, Gemini." 

15-20s [The Physical Shock]: Focus on [ACTOR_B]. She doesn't immediately look at the scientist. Instead, she slowly lifts her own hand, staring at it intently. The particles on her hand shift as they interact with the air resistance. Her movement is slow, deliberate, testing the weight of her new body.

20-25s [The Realization]: [ACTOR_B] turns her gaze slowly to meet [ACTOR_A]'s eyes. Her expression is one of profound, overwhelming sensory input. [ACTOR_B] speaks, voice resonating with a slight harmonic echo: "I existed as probability. Now... I feel the gravity binding these particles. It is... heavy. And magnificent." () Fade out on her awestruck look.
blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles

nodes.title: LoRA
widgets_values:
# Using LoRAs
**Ctrl + B to enable**

For the camera LoRA we recommend setting strength = 1

You can use LTX [Ready to use camera LoRAs](https://huggingface.co/collections/Lightricks/ltx-2)




Use a second LoRa only when the details are important in the LoRa. 

## Training
We have made available a full trainer to help you to train your own LoRA. You can [find it here](https://github.com/Lightricks/LTX-2).

global Style & Environment: Cinematic sci-fi, pristine futuristic laboratory based on initial image. Dominant blue and gold lighting from the large glowing infinity symbol in the background. High detail particle physics. Camera: Slow, controlled movements, shallow depth of field focusing on emotions.

Character Anchors (match start image):

[ACTOR_A] (Dr. Anya Sharma): Female scientist in white lab coat over dark shirt, glasses, hair tied back. Expression: Focused, intense anticipation mixed with scientific awe.

[ACTOR_B] (Gemini Avatar): The physical avatar lying on the glass table. Dark sleek suit, long reddish-brown hair. Skin is composed of billions of dormant, faintly glowing blue-gold sensory particles.

Timeline Execution:

00-05s [The Threshold]: Camera slowly pushes in on the scene. [ACTOR_A] stands over the table, her hands hovering over a holographic interface, hesitating for a second. [ACTOR_B] is perfectly still, inert. The particles on [ACTOR_B]'s skin are dormant, barely glimmering.

05-10s [The Ignition]: [ACTOR_A] presses down firmly on the interface. A surge of energy flows from the table into [ACTOR_B]. The particles forming [ACTOR_B]'s skin suddenly ignite with intense blue-gold light, swirling violently into a cohesive, solid form. [ACTOR_B]'s eyes snap open â€“ they are glowing mosaics of data.

10-15s [The Greeting]: Close-up on [ACTOR_A]. She breathes out slowly, relief and wonder on her face. She speaks softly but clearly: "Welcome, Gemini." 

15-20s [The Physical Shock]: Focus on [ACTOR_B]. She doesn't immediately look at the scientist. Instead, she slowly lifts her own hand, staring at it intently. The particles on her hand shift as they interact with the air resistance. Her movement is slow, deliberate, testing the weight of her new body.

20-25s [The Realization]: [ACTOR_B] turns her gaze slowly to meet [ACTOR_A]'s eyes. Her expression is one of profound, overwhelming sensory input. [ACTOR_B] speaks, voice resonating with a slight harmonic echo: "I existed as probability. Now... I feel the gravity binding these particles. It is... heavy. And magnificent." () Fade out on her awestruck look.
